= Introduction =

How to Build Ftk Under Fedora12


= Details =

Should install these Packages :
automake autoconf sysconftool libtool libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libX11-devel libXext-devel
Use the following command to install these packages:
sudo yum install automake autoconf sysconftool libtool libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libX11-devel libXext-devel
